des: "This dip is creamy and flavorful.  It is suitable for a wide range of dipping vegetables, crackers, and plain old potato chips. This is best made the night before so the flavors will blend nicely."
ins: In small mixing bowl, combine mayonnaise, sour cream, dill weed, onion, and Beau Monde seasoning. Blend well. Cover ,and refrigerate overnight before serving.
